title: Amazon Q Business to Gmail
description: Use Amazon Q Business to build a generative AI application to derive insights from content present in a Gmail repository.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Amazon Q Business Application: Amazon Q Business application created with Gmail as the data source.
Gmail: The Gmail repository that contains emails and attachments to be indexed

AWS Lambda: AWS Lambda function `DataSourceSync` crawls and indexes the content from Gmail. The Amazon Q Business application retrieves data from the indexed content and provides a generated response.
